creator: epugh@upstate.com
text:
Hi all,

The LineContains filter did not work on my box with a CVS build of Ant.  I 
created a testcase that validated that it did not work.  I have since fixed 
it.  However, I also added another feature as well.  I added a parameter 
containsAll that allows you to either specify that a line must contain ALL of 
the values, or it can contain ANY of the values.  By default for backward 
comptablity it is optional and true.  

The new testcase for LineContains and the patched line contains I'll attache.  
After I spent time adding the containsAll option, it turned out I didn't need 
it.  so if the committers don't want the linecontains containsAll option, it 
can be removed easily.

Eric Pugh
